extendedInfo.description: EXPLORE PARKS !Find, Visit, Track, and Share your activities and experience in the exploreParks. We have National, State , County and Local parks that meet your outdoor recreational needs. Here we are all about parks, the entire park not just trails, but quality overviews, points-of-interests, activities, photos, trails, fees, reviews and moreâ¦ KEY FEATURESDIGITAL MAPPING & TRACKINGWe work with the Park Systems to ensure that we provide you with the best trail and points-of-interest information available. exploreParks is powered by our solution that allows Park Systems to update you directly with the latest information and conditions .â Interactive Digital Park Maps with over 80 different points-of-interest supportedâ Digital Trail Maps with elevation and other key statsâ Track and Save your activities with the Park Map in background, know exactly where you are â Our Tracking utilizes multi-tasking capabilities to allow you do other things and come back to your location and trackâ View detailed information on key points-of-interest as the appear on the mapâ Share your location with friends real-time that can be viewed through their mobile or the web.and moreâ¦ROBUST PARK SEARCHSearch our database of parks. Find parks with activities and services that best suit your outdoor recreational needs. Our parks include detailed overviews, activities and amenities available, trails, photos,â Detailed Park Overviews â Park and Trail amenities and points-of-interestâ Park and Trail activities allowed â View Park photo galleriesâ Read and Share Park and Trail Reviews âSave your Favorite Parks and Trails for quick access laterand moreâ¦SHARING & COMMUNITYâ Find friendsâ Find, join and create groupsâ Share your experiences via location, photo and review toolsâ Organize events, rides, runs and more with your friends.exploreParks is owned and operated by Traipse Media Corporation and its parkPro and MapPro solutions for parks. Your support of our application benefits park systems. Thank you for your support,Tom LandersCEO Traipse Media Corporation
